snippet.title: RUNA & THE CHAIKURÚ LEGACY | EARLY ACCESS AVAILABLE ON AUGUST 26
snippet.description:
RUNA & THE CHAIKURÚ LEGACY
Platform: PC 
Early Access: August 26th, 2024

Immerse yourself in a stimulating adventure to help Runa uncover the mysteries of the Chaikurú civilization!

Runa & the Chaikurú Legacy is a 3D platformer adventure with exploration, combat, and puzzle elements. In the game, we’ll accompany the young adventurer Runa as she explores the ruins and discovers the secrets of the ancient Chaikurú civilization under the orders of the obscure and mysterious Company.

A demo of Runa & the Chaikurú Legacy is already free on Steam and you can also add it to your wishlist there and on Epic Games! -- https://t.co/arEk1f3Mr2 

For more information visit https://www.fannypackstudios.com/ or follow Fanny Pack Studio's social media: 

Discord – ask for the link in the comments! 
Facebook – https://www.facebook.com/fannypackstudios 
Twitter – https://twitter.com/FannyPackStu/ 
Instagram – https://www.instagram.com/fannypackstudios/ 
TikTok – https://www.tiktok.com/@runachaikuru
